lead_paragraph: One of the hidden benefits of AT&T's $48.5 billion planned purchase of DirecTV is that it raises the possibility of making DirecTV's programming crown jewel, NFL Sunday Ticket, more broadly available on mobile devices.

headline.main: AT&T Eyes Football in DirecTV Buy
headline.print_headline: AT&T Eyes Football in DirecTV Buy
